faqs.answer:
DerbyCon is being held on October 3 – October 7, 2018 at the Marriott Louisville, 280 West Jefferson, Louisville, Kentucky.

Additional venue information can be found here: https://www.derbycon.com/venue/
faqs.question: When and where is DerbyCon?

faqs.answer: Please visit: https://www.derbycon.com for more information.
faqs.question: This FAQ didn't answer my questions, or was unclear, how can I get further information?

faqs.answer:
DerbyCon has an official slack channel. Share ideas, meet one another, buy/sell tickets, and be open and friendly. Note that this is a PG chatroom. We can’t validate any tickets or guarantee ticket validity in the chat room. Feel free to ask questions, talk infosec, and welcome to the group!

You can join it here:

https://join.slack.com/t/derbycon/shared_invite/enQtMzc2MDA1NzIzNjM1LWE2YjhlNTMwY2U4MjU4NzVjMDdhOTczYWZkMWI1NGUwNDZlZTY0OTM4NDdlZmZjNjVkZjQwNDM1NmZjYjI3ZDA

Current channels:

#general – used for general chat, anything you want (PG)
#night-events – talking about night activities at DerbyCon
#presentations – talk about talks – what presentations, what to see
#random – random stuff, whatever you want – non Derby related (PG)
#-sell-buy-tickets – sell or buy tickets in this chat room
#training – talk about training and whats going on in training
#hiring – if you are hiring or looking for a job
#mentorship – want to mentor someone or have questions or want to be mentored?
#charity – chat designed for favorite charities or if someone is going through a tough spot and needs help
faqs.question: Does DerbyCon have a Slack channel?

faqs.answer:
DerbyCon live streams can be found here:

http://www.irongeek.com/i.php?page=derbyconstreams

If you are in the Hyatt Louisville, you can turn to channel 82-85 and channel 8 in order to watch DerbyCon from your room.

Channels:

Track 1: 82
Track 2: 83
Track 3: 84
Track 4: 85
Stable Talks: 8
faqs.question: Will the talks be streamed?
